tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE CustomerPurchaseHistory (
    customer_id INT,
    purchase_date DATE,
    purchase_amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
    product_id INT,
    product_category VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE purchases (
    purchase_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    purchase_date DATE,
    purchase_amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
    product_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (customer_id) REFERENCES customers(customer_id)
);

CREATE TABLE customers (
    customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name TEXT,
    email TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE purchases (
    purchase_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    date DATE,
    total_amount DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE products (
    product_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name TEXT,
    category TEXT
)
CREATE TABLE Customer (customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY, customer_name VARCHAR(50), email VARCHAR(50), phone_number VARCHAR(15));
CREATE TABLE PurchaseHistory (purchase_id INT PRIMARY KEY, customer_id INT, purchase_date DATE, total_amount DECIMAL(10,2));
CREATE TABLE Product (product_id INT PRIMARY KEY, product_name VARCHAR(50), category VARCHAR(50), price DECIMAL(10,2));
CREATE TABLE Promotion (promotion_id INT PRIMARY KEY, promotion_name VARCHAR(50), start_date DATE, end_date DATE);
